column4: Hey everyone! :) I've got this problem where Ubuntu can't tell that I have an nvidia graphics card. When I LSHW is shows up as UNCLAIMED MCP67 co-processor
Any ideas on how to fix this?
i have the same issue as him :p not so rare
I don't mean that the problem is rare, so much as that the install of an OS on a USB hard drive actually working, at all, is very rare. The fact that it worked WELL as ubuntu 8 is amazing.
